SEARCH
Package model

Interface FileInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
CSVFile
public interface FileInterface
This interface represents all the I/O operations to be supported by a file database.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type

  • Method Details

    • createFile

      Path createFile(String path, String folderName, String filePrefix, String extension)
      Creates a new file at the specified path passed to it as parameter.
      Parameters:
      path - specify absolute path or relative path by passing ~
      folderName - directory of file structure where the file needs to be stored
      filePrefix - Prefix name of the file to be searched
      extension - extension of the file to be read
      Returns:
      boolean value based on file creation success or failure

    • exists

      boolean exists(String path, String folderName, String fileName, String extension)
      Checks whether the file exists or not.
      Parameters:
      path - specify absolute path or relative path by passing ~
      folderName - directory of file structure where the file needs to be stored
      fileName - name of the file to be searched
      extension - extension of the file to be read
      Returns:
      true if file is found, false otherwise

    • createFilePath

      Path createFilePath(String path, String folderName, String fileName, String extension)
      Return the path formed from the given folder name, file name and extension relative to Home path.
      Parameters:
      path - specify absolute path or relative path by passing ~
      folderName - directory of file structure where the file needs to be stored
      fileName - name of the file to be searched
      extension - extension of the file to be read
      Returns:
      file path object

    • deleteFile

      boolean deleteFile(String path, String folderName, String fileName, String extension)
      Delete file at the specified path passed to it as parameter.
      Parameters:
      path - specify absolute path or relative path by passing ~
      folderName - directory of file structure where the file needs to be deleted from
      fileName - name of the file to be searched
      extension - extension of the file to be read
      Returns:
      boolean value based on file deletion success or failure

    • writeToFile

      boolean writeToFile(String path, String folderName, String filePrefix, byte[] dataBytes)
      Writes data to file in format that is depended on the concrete implementation of this interface.
      Parameters:
      path - specify absolute path or relative path by passing ~
      folderName - directory where the file needs to be stored
      filePrefix - the symbol of the stock whose data needs to be stored
      dataBytes - data to be written to file in bytes format
      Returns:
      true if write is successful, else returns false

    • readFromFile

      List<String> readFromFile(String path, String folderName, String filePrefix)
      Read data from file in format that is depended on the concrete implementation of this interface.
      Parameters:
      path - specify absolute path or relative path by passing ~
      folderName - directory where the file needs to be read from
      filePrefix - the symbol of the stock whose data needs to be retrieved
      Returns:
      individual records that are retrieved from file

    • getFileExtension

      String getFileExtension()
      Returns the file extension.
      Returns:
      file extension as string

    • getRecordDelimiter

      String getRecordDelimiter()
      Returns the record delimiter.
      Returns:
      record delimiter as string

    • convertObjectIntoString

      String convertObjectIntoString(String object, List<String> referenceFile)
      Convert Object into record representation for this file implementation.
      Parameters:
      object - object in string format that needs to be mapped to this file format
      referenceFile - if object is dependent on other object type, then it can be stored in another file, and a reference of that file is given
      Returns:
      string representation of that object in this file implementation

    • convertObjectListIntoString

      <T> String convertObjectListIntoString(List<T> objectList)
      Convert Object List into records representation for this file implementation.
      Type Parameters:
      T - Custom object whose list is passed as parameter
      Parameters:
      objectList - list of objects that is to be represented in this file implementation
      Returns:
      string representation of that object list in this file implementation

    • validateFormat

      <T> List<T> validateFormat(String content)
      Check data content that needs to be checked against file interface implementation.
      Type Parameters:
      T - Custom object whose list is passed as parameter
      Parameters:
      content - data content in string format
      Returns:
      list of individual reports
